CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 16, 1961, pg. A27, reads: "TOMMY SMITHS EYE TITLE - The crack Tommy Smith team, winner of Section 2 honors in Ammon Slow Pitch League, remains tied with Broadway in the best two-out-of-three series in the playoffs for the right to meet the Porkys. Section I titlist, for the league championship, following Wednesday's game on the Ammon Field.  The Smiths were leading, 12-10, when darkness halted the game.  The deciding tilt will be played Monday...  - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Thomas J. "Tommy" Smith holding baseball bat, with Tommy Smith softball team members, possibly including Pete Matthews third from left, and batboy Wesley Connors on right, and boys, posed on Ammon field
